snippet: Here at the magazine, our minds are long-since corrupted, and we're just looking for something great to read this summer while we bake ourselves toward oblivion.
abstract: Here at the magazine, our minds are long-since corrupted, and we're just looking for something great to read this summer while we bake ourselves toward oblivion.

headline.main: What to Read at the Beach, or: Get Your Red-Hot Summer Trash Right Here!
